nodes.text: "Coruscant" is the fifteenth booklet the canon reference book series titled Star Wars Encyclopedia. It was  published on February 9, 2021 by De Agostini and on February 19 of that same year by Altaya.

Ever since written chronicles exist, Coruscant, also known as "the Core," was the governmental, cultural, judicial and power center, benign or evil. Every seasoned traveler knew that the coordinates of the planet were 0-0-0.
